attributes.action: Recognise the actions taken by the military in Burma to be those of deliberate Genocide.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The refusal by the military to allow international aid into the Irrawaddy Delta and the deliberate hindrance of Burmese people and aid agencies to get aid into this area is by the official definition of the word Genocide. We call for the Government to take steps in the EU and UN to have this recognised as such and suitable action taken.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
